game.name: Secret of Sardinia
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Swim through a desolate underwater world to discover the truth of your lost civilization. As the last sardine in Sardinia, you must translate ancient fragments, listen to the voices of the dead, and rebuild a forgotten mythology as you uncover the deepest secrets of the sea.
